author: Ronan Collins
description: Raspberry fruit richness is balanced by bitter botanical complexity in this Irish whiskey-based alternative to an Old-Fashioned.
name: Super Seedy
recipeIngredient: 2.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)

video.description: Raspberry fruit richness is balanced by bitter botanical complexity in this Irish whiskey-based alternative to an Old-Fashioned.
video.name: HOWTO make Super Seedy
